content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (x=-13.0, y=-48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-15.0, y=-50.0) with a drop position at (x=-14.5, y=-48.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-48.5) storing iron ore
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-13.0, y=-48.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-14.5, y=-46.5) waiting for source items, intended to transfer items from the chest to the furnace

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (x=-11.0, y=-48.0) and (x=-9.0, y=-48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-11.0, y=-48.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-9.0, y=-48.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0) with a drop position at (x=41.5, y=-80.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=41.5, y=-80.5) storing coal
- Stone Furnace at position (x=43.0, y=-82.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (x=43.5, y=-80.5) waiting for source items, intended to transfer items from the chest to the furnace

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items with insufficient inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity.

### Errors when placing entities with collision issues
- Before placing an entity, verify that the intended position is free of other entities or obstacles. Consider adjusting the spacing, direction, or reference position to avoid collisions.

### Inserter waiting for source items
- Ensure that the source chest or entity has the necessary items available for the inserter to function. Check the supply chain to ensure continuous item flow.
